reviewText: I was browsing Amazon for some Black Rock Shooter items and came across this. I decided to order whilst I save up for the Black Rock Shooter Blu-ray collection. This Blu-ray set comes with a CD mix and and teaser of the Black Rock Shooter OVA.

Cool, and great for a collection.  If you are not a FAN of BRS, Vocaloid, Hatsune Miku, or ryo you may want to skip this.  If you are a FAN of one or MORE of the above, this is probably a NEEDED item for you!
This looks like it was a freebee promo item in Japan. It has 3 90 second Trailers on the "Movie Disk" promoting the Series, and a 2 minute song on the "Music Disk". I feel ripped off.
